ACCEPTED_1.message: 素晴らしい。あなたの船に商品を載せよう。

ACCEPTED_3.message: よし、いいね。君を信頼できることを願うよ。

ACCEPTED_PICKUP_1.message: よし、商品が回収できるかどうか確認しよう。

ACCEPTED_PICKUP_2.message: It's a deal! I will let my colleagues know that you are on your way.

ADTEXT_1.message: 貨物輸送・{system} 星系に貨物を届ける。

ADTEXT_2.message: 輸送手段求む! {system} 星系で必要とされている商品の輸送。{cash}払う。

ADTEXT_EXPENSIVE_1.message: 配達・{system} 星系に高価な貨物を輸送。ベテランパイロットに {cash} 支払う。

ADTEXT_LOCAL_1.message: 地域輸送・{starport} に商品を移動する。

ADTEXT_LOCAL_2.message: 輸送が必要・{starport} にローカル貨物の配達。

ADTEXT_LOCAL_3.message: ローカル貨物輸送・{starport} に商品の輸送。

ADTEXT_PICKUP_1.message: 貨物ピックアップ・ {system} 星系から貨物の集荷が必要。

ADTEXT_PICKUP_LOCAL_1.message: 貨物移転・{starport} から貨物の移動が必要。

ADTEXT_WHOLESALER_1.message: 貨物輸送サービス・ {system} 星系に配達する輸送船が必要。

AMOUNT.description: Shown in mission summary. The amount of cargo

CEASE_FIRE.message: Cease fire, cease fire! I'm on your side!

COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: 最初の要請を繰り返してくれませんか?

DENY_1.message: I'm sorry, but this cargo is too valuable for me to hand over to an inexperienced pilot.

DENY_2.message: I've never heard of you. I don't know you and I don't trust you.

DENY_3.message: I'm sorry, I'm looking for an experienced pilot.

DENY_4.message: Excuse me, but I don't think you have what it takes to get the job done.

DENY_5.message: Don't waste my time! You are too wet behind the ears.

DENY_6.message: Come back when you're more experienced.

DISTANCE.description: distance in space, between two locations

ESCORT_CHATTER_1.message: Hostile craft detected. Let us attack it together.

ESCORT_CHATTER_2.message: Great. This pirate will be my first kill.

ESCORT_CHATTER_4.message: Proceed to your destination. I'll cover you.

ESCORT_CHATTER_5.message: Tally ho. This will be my first catch today.

FAILUREMSG_1.message: I'm very disappointed by the late delivery. You will not be paid.

FAILUREMSG_2.message: You are too late! What should I do with this now, it's worthless!

FAILUREMSG_3.message: Listen, we were clear about the deadline. You can forget about getting paid.

FAILUREMSG_4.message: From now on, I will reject all job requests from you.

FAILUREMSG_FLUFFY_1.message: You monster! You've waited too long for this delivery. All my fluffy pets are starved!

GUNS_GUNS_GUNS.description: Military radio call to avoid friendly fire. It indicates that the cannon has been activated and should ensure that other friendly pilots do not maneuver into the path of harm.

HOWMUCH_SINGULAR_1.description: This string is only used for 1 metric tons (singular)

HOW_SOON_MUST_IT_BE_DELIVERED.message: いつまでに届ければいい?

INTROTEXT_1.message: やあ、私は{name}だ。もし君が{dist}光年先にある{system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) 星系の{starport}に{cargoname}を配達してくれれば{cash}払うよ。

INTROTEXT_2.description: {name} is the full name of a person
INTROTEXT_2.message: こんにちは! {name}輸送サービスは　{dist}光年離れた{system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) 星系の{starport}への{cargoname}の配達であなたを必要としている。我々は安全かつ完全な配達に対し{cash}支払う。

INTROTEXT_3.message: いい日だね。私は{name}で、{name} Ltd.の創始者だ。私は{dist}光年先にある{system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) 星系の{starport}に{cargoname}を配達する信頼できるものを必要としている。{dist}後年の長距離飛行に対して{cash}払おう。

INTROTEXT_EXPENSIVE_1.message: Hello. We need someone experienced for a potentially dangerous run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. We'll pay {cash}. The distance is {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT_FLUFFY_1.description: this is used for the delivery of Quibbles, which is a nod to Tribble (star trek ref. see wikipedia)
INTROTEXT_FLUFFY_1.message: Hi, my name is {name}. I have a fluffy shipment of {cargoname} for delivery to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. The distance is {dist} ly. For this delivery I will pay you {cash}.

INTROTEXT_INFRASTRUCTURE_1.message: Greetings. I'm {name}. The {system} government wants to deliver {cargoname} to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. The pay is {cash}. {system} is located {dist} ly from here.

INTROTEXT_LOCAL_1.message: Nice to meet you. I'm {name} and I work for the {starport} administration. We pay {cash} to someone who is able to move {cargoname} to {starport}.

INTROTEXT_LOCAL_2.message: Hi. I'm {name} and I will pay {cash} for a short delivery of {cargoname} to {starport}.

INTROTEXT_LOCAL_3.message: My name is {name} and I need {cargoname} delivered to a client at {starport}. I'll pay you {cash} for this run.

INTROTEXT_MINING_1.description: {name} is the full name of a person
INTROTEXT_MINING_1.message: こんにちは。 {name}マイニングカンパニーは、新しい鉱山を建設するために{dist}光年離れた{system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) 星系の{starport}への{cargoname}の配達を必要としている。支払いは{cash}だ。

INTROTEXT_PICKUP_1.message: How do you do? My name is {name}, and I need a ship that is able to fly to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, to pickup {cargoname} and return to {dom_starport} in the {dom_system} ({dom_sectorx}, {dom_sectory}, {dom_sectorz}) system for {cash}. The distance to {system} is {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT_PICKUP_2.message: How are you? I'm {name}. One of my clients wants to import {cargoname} from {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, {dist} ly distant. He pays {cash} for this cargo run. Return here to {dom_starport} in the {dom_system} ({dom_sectorx}, {dom_sectory}, {dom_sectorz}) system to unload the cargo.

INTROTEXT_PICKUP_LOCAL_1.message: Greetings. I'm {name}. I will pay {cash} to someone who will transport {cargoname} from {starport} to {dom_starport}.

INTROTEXT_PICKUP_LOCAL_2.message: Hello. My name is {name}. My employer is willing to hire you for {cash} to help us relocate our warehouse by moving {cargoname} from {starport} to our new domicile {dom_starport}.

INTROTEXT_WEDDING_1.message: Greetings. Have you heard of the wedding season of {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system? We want to transport {cargoname} there. It's {dist} ly away. The pay is {cash}. How about it?

INTROTEXT_WHOLESALER_1.message: Hello, my name is {name} and I'm a wholesale dealer in the {system} system. I pay {cash} for the run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT_WHOLESALER_2.message: Greetings, my name is {name} and I work for Haber Corp. We pay {cash} for the run to {starport} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly.

I_AM_ON_MY_WAY.message: Sensors show that you are taking damage. I'm on my way.

I_HAVE_DEBITED_YOUR_ACCOUNT.message: I've debited your account with the missing goods.

I_NEED_HELP.message: I'm taking damage. I need help.

PIRATE_GRIPES_1.message: Damn! You will pay for this!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_1.message: This will be your last run!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_2.message: You work for {client}? This will be the end of you!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_3.message: Hey buddy, hand over the goods. Now!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_4.message: Pal, you'll never reach your destination.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_5.message: Ah, another fat goose en route to {location}.

PIRATE_TAUNTS_6.message: Looks like you're carrying more than you can handle. Let me help you with that.

QUIBBLES.description: custom cargo, also used in the NewsEventCommodity module, a nod to Star Trek's Tribble (check wikipedia)

RISK_1.message: 面倒なことにはならないと思います。

RISK_2.message: いつもより何かあるわけじゃない。

RISK_3.message: これは高価な貨物です。しっかり見張っていてください。

RISK_4.message: 危険かもしれません。十分に準備をしておいてください。

RISK_5.message: これはひょとすると非常に危険です。いくつかの大規模なレジスタンスの中に入るかもしれません。

RISK_6.message: Don't count on reaching your destination unharmed.

RISK_ART_1.message: The goods are very sought after by art lovers.

RISK_EXPENSIVE_1.message: We have done everything to keep the delivery secret. But we can never be certain.

RISK_EXPENSIVE_2.message: The police informed us that an unknown group of pirates is operating in this system.

RISK_GEMS_1.message: It is possible that an unscrupulous jewel trader wants to intercept the cargo.

RISK_WHOLESALER_1.message: Don't worry. A police patrol is ready in case of trouble.

RISK_WHOLESALER_2.message: Maybe there's a risk. But the police have promised us to patrol the area.

RISK_WHOLESALER_3.message: The risk is high. But an escort is ready to guard you.

SET_AS_TARGET.message: ナビゲーションターゲットとして設定

STEM_BOLTS.description: custom cargo, used in Star Trek DS9 as something with unclear usefulness

SUCCESSMSG_1.message: Thank you for the delivery. You have been paid.

SUCCESSMSG_2.message: Thanks for the timely delivery. The money was transferred.

SUCCESSMSG_3.message: Excellent, it was a pleasure to work with you. I have paid the bill.

SUCCESSMSG_4.message: Thanks! I will definitely recommend you. Money has been transferred.

SUCCESSMSG_FLUFFY_1.description: Said when receiving a shipment of Quibbles (see wikipedia Tribble)
SUCCESSMSG_FLUFFY_1.message: Oh dear, what to do with so many fluffy beings. Either way, money has been sent.

TOO_LATE_TO_PICK_UP.message: You are much too late! Your performance is so bad that I am cancelling my contract with you.

URGENCY_1.message: There is no rush. It must be delivered by {date}.

URGENCY_2.message: It must necessarily be delivered by {date}.

URGENCY_3.message: Because of the tight schedule it must be delivered by {date}.

URGENCY_4.message: We are in a hurry, so it must be delivered by {date}.

URGENCY_5.message: It is essential that the goods have been delivered before {date}.

URGENCY_FLUFFY_1.message: Because of the reproduction rate of the little animals and the limited food in the container, the delivery must be completed until {date}.

URGENCY_RADIOACTIVE_1.message: Because of the half-life period of this isotope, delivery must be completed by {date}.

WE_HAVE_LOADED_UP_THE_CARGO_ON_YOUR_SHIP.message: We have loaded up the cargo on your ship.

WHAT_IS_THIS.message: What's this? Have you jettisoned my cargo? Are you crazy?

WHYSOMUCH_2.message: Accept it, or leave it be.

WHYSOMUCH_4.message: The pay reflects our wish for the goods to be delivered on time and in one piece.

WHYSOMUCH_5.message: See it as a bonus for you to be discreet about this delivery.

WHYSOMUCH_6.message: Well, we would be happy to pay you less.

WHYSOMUCH_CENTRIFUGES_1.message: Some {cargoname} were destroyed due to a software error and have to be replaced urgently.

WHYSOMUCH_CHEMICAL_1.message: The production in the chemical plant depends on these goods and must not be interrupted. Nothing must stop the machine.

WHYSOMUCH_EXPENSIVE_1.message: Valuable goods are in great demand.

WHYSOMUCH_EXPENSIVE_2.message: Because these goods are quite expensive.

WHYSOMUCH_FLUFFY_1.message: {cargoname} is a fast seller this season. You should invest in {cargoname} shares if you want to make a lot of money.

WHYSOMUCH_INFRASTRUCTURE_1.message: These goods are crucial for a construction project.

WHYSOMUCH_MINING_1.message: These goods are essential for the construction of a new mine.

WHYSOMUCH_URGENT_1.message: My favourite pilot is sick and time is short.

WHYSOMUCH_URGENT_2.message: If we do not meet the delivery date, the project will come to a standstill.

WHYSOMUCH_WEDDING_1.message: So far I could not find anyone to perform this transport. When the season is over, my merchandise is worthless.

WILL_I_BE_IN_ANY_DANGER.message: 何か危険がありますか?

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_ENOUGH_CARGO_SPACE_ON_YO.message: You do not have enough cargo space on your ship.

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_ENOUGH_EMPTY_CARGO_SPACE.message: Please come back when you have sufficient cargo space.
